graph_title: Great Place to Work trust index
indicator_name: Great Place to Work trust index
SDG_GOAL: Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages
SDG_TARGET: Substantially increase health financing and the recruitment, development, training and retention of the health workforce in developing countries, especially in least developed countries and small island developing States
SDG_INDICATOR: Great Place to Work trust index
DATA_COMP: The average of GPTW statements, i.e. the number of respondents who answered 4 or 5 on a scale of 1-5
